steps: step 1: Navigate to https://cox-ui.uat.cloudmc.io/
step 2: Login
step 3: Click on button 'Edge Compute 2.0' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/workload'
step 4: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/storage'
step 5: Click on div  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/snapshots'
step 6: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/networks'
step 7: Click on svg
step 8: Perform input, span, and p actions
step 9: Click on button 'VPC 2.0' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/networks'
step 10: Click on svg
step 11: Perform input, span, and p actions
step 12: Click on button 'Edge Compute 2.0' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/workload'
step 13: Click on p
step 14: Input and click objects
step 15: Click on div  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/workload'
step 16: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/networks'
step 17: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/storage'
step 18: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/networks'
step 19: Click on svg
step 20: Perform input, span, and p actions
step 21: Click on button 'VPC 2.0' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/networks'
step 22: Click on svg
step 23: Perform input, span, and p actions
step 24: Click on button 'VPC 2.0' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/networks'
step 25: Click on input field
step 26: Perform input, span, and p actions
step 27: Click on button 'VPC Networks' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/networks'
step 28: Enter input value in input field
step 29: Click on div
step 30: Navigate home, add bare metal server, and input details
step 31: Click on div
step 32: Enter input value in input field
step 33: Click on button 'add-bm-step2-next'
step 34: Click on svg  -> Navigate to page 'services/baremetal-services/testbm/servers'
step 35: Click on button 'Bare Metal' -> Navigate to page 'services/baremetal-services'
step 36: Click on button
step 37: Click on div
step 38: Click on button 'Home' -> Navigate to page 'home'
step 39: Click on button 'Edge Compute 2.0' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/workload'
step 40: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/storage'
step 41: Click on svg
step 42: Click on span
step 43: Click on button 'Cancel'
step 44: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/workload'
step 45: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
